response: This paper introduces YOLOv9, a new object detection system.  It utilizes Programmable Gradient Information (PGI) to address information loss during feedforward processing in neural networks and Generalized ELAN (GELAN) for an efficient and lightweight architecture.  YOLOv9 achieved top performance in experiments on the MS COCO dataset.
